verses.verse: וַיַּֽעַשׂ־ <WH6213> And [David] made ל֥וֹ בָתִּ֖ים <WH1004> him houses בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in the city דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> of David וַיָּ֤כֶן <WH3559> and prepared מָקוֹם֙ <WH4725> a place לַֽאֲר֣וֹן <WH727> for the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וַיֶּט־ <WH5186> and pitched ל֖וֹ אֹֽהֶל׃ <WH168> for it a tent

אָ֚ז <WH227> Then אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> Then David לֹ֤א <WH3808> No לָשֵׂאת֙ <WH5375> None ought to carry אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God כִּ֖י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> but the Levites כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָ֣ם ׀ בָּחַ֣ר <WH977> chosen יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> for them hath the LORD לָשֵׂ֞את <WH5375> to carry אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֧וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD וּֽלְשָׁרְת֖וֹ <WH8334> and to minister עַד־ <WH5704> unto him for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever ס

וַיַּקְהֵ֥ל <WH6950> together דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> all Israel אֶל־ <WH413> at יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem לְהַעֲלוֹת֙ <WH5927> to bring up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מְקוֹמ֖וֹ <WH4725> unto his place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֵכִ֥ין <WH3559> which he had prepared לֽוֹ׃
וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ף <WH622> assembled דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children אַֽהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> of Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> and the Levites

לִבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> Of the sons קְהָ֑ת <WH6955> of Kohath אוּרִיאֵ֣ל <WH222> Uriel הַשָּׂ֔ר <WH8269> the chief וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> and his brethren מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> and twenty ס

לִבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> Of the sons מְרָרִ֑י <WH4847> of Merari עֲשָׂיָ֣ה <WH6222> Asaiah הַשָּׂ֔ר <WH8269> the chief וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> and his brethren מָאתַ֥יִם <WH3967> two hundred וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> and twenty ס

לִבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> Of the sons גֵּרְשׁ֑וֹם <WH1648> Gershon יוֹאֵ֣ל <WH3100> Joel הַשָּׂ֔ר <WH8269> the chief וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> and his brethren מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> an hundred וּשְׁלֹשִֽׁים׃ <WH7970> and thirty ס
לִבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> Of the sons אֱלִֽיצָפָ֑ן <WH469> of Elizaphan שְׁמַֽעְיָ֥ה <WH8098> Shemaiah הַשָּׂ֖ר <WH8269> the chief וְאֶחָ֥יו <WH251> and his brethren מָאתָֽיִם׃ <WH3967> two hundred ס
לִבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> Of the sons חֶבְר֑וֹן <WH2275> of Hebron אֱלִיאֵ֥ל <WH447> Eliel הַשָּׂ֖ר <WH8269> the chief וְאֶחָ֥יו <WH251> and his brethren שְׁמוֹנִֽים׃ <WH8084> fourscore ס

לִבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> Of the sons עֻזִּיאֵ֑ל <WH5816> of Uzziel עַמִּינָדָ֣ב <WH5992> Amminadab הַשָּׂ֔ר <WH8269> the chief וְאֶחָ֕יו <WH251> and his brethren מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred וּשְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> ten ס

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> called דָוִ֔יד <WH1732> And David לְצָד֥וֹק <WH6659> for Zadok וּלְאֶבְיָתָ֖ר <WH54> and Abiathar הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> and for the Levites לְאֽוּרִיאֵ֤ל <WH222> for Uriel עֲשָׂיָה֙ <WH6222> Asaiah וְיוֹאֵ֣ל <WH3100> and Joel שְׁמַֽעְיָ֔ה <WH8098> Shemaiah וֶאֱלִיאֵ֖ל <WH447> and Eliel וְעַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <WH5992> and Amminadab

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And said לָהֶ֔ם אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> You רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> unto them Ye [are] the chief הָאָב֖וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> of the Levites הִֽתְקַדְּשׁוּ֙ <WH6942> sanctify אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you וַאֲחֵיכֶ֔ם <WH251> yourselves [both] ye and your brethren וְהַֽעֲלִיתֶ֗ם <WH5927> that ye may bring up אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> that הֲכִינ֖וֹתִי <WH3559> unto [the place that] I have prepared לֽוֹ׃

כִּ֛י <WH3588> Because לְמַבָּרִ֥אשׁוֹנָ֖ה <WH7223> For because ye [did it] not at the first לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אַתֶּ֑ם <WH859> you פָּרַ֨ץ <WH6555> made a breach יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> our God בָּ֔נוּ כִּי־ <WH3588> Because לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not דְרַשְׁנֻ֖הוּ <WH1875> upon us for that we sought כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> him not after the due order

וַיִּֽתְקַדְּשׁ֔וּ <WH6942> sanctified הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> So the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> and the Levites לְהַעֲל֕וֹת <WH5927> themselves to bring up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> bare בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> of the Levites אֵ֚ת <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> thereon as Moses כִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> according to the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD בִּכְתֵפָ֥ם <WH3802> upon their shoulders בַּמֹּט֖וֹת <WH4133> with the staves עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> thereon פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake דָּוִיד֮ <WH1732> And David לְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> to the chief הַלְוִיִּם֒ <WH3881> of the Levites לְהַֽעֲמִ֗יד <WH5975> to appoint אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחֵיהֶם֙ <WH251> their brethren הַמְשֹׁ֣רְרִ֔ים <WH7891> [to be] the singers בִּכְלֵי־ <WH3627> with instruments שִׁ֛יר <WH7892> of musick נְבָלִ֥ים <WH5035> psalteries וְכִנֹּר֖וֹת <WH3658> and harps וּמְצִלְתָּ֑יִם <WH4700> and cymbals מַשְׁמִיעִ֥ים <WH8085> sounding לְהָרִֽים־ <WH7311> by lifting up בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> the voice לְשִׂמְחָֽה׃ <WH8057> with joy פ

וַיַּעֲמִ֣ידוּ <WH5975> appointed הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> So the Levites אֵ֚ת <WH853> הֵימָ֣ן <WH1968> Heman בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאֵ֔ל <WH3100> of Joel וּמִ֨ן־ <WH4480> and from אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> and of his brethren אָסָ֖ף <WH623> Asaph בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בֶּֽרֶכְיָ֑הוּ <WH1296> of Berechiah ס וּמִן־ <WH4480> and from בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> and of the sons מְרָרִי֙ <WH4847> of Merari אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <WH251> their brethren אֵיתָ֖ן <WH387> Ethan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קֽוּשָׁיָֽהוּ׃ <WH6984> of Kushaiah

וְעִמָּהֶ֖ם <WH5973> them אֲחֵיהֶ֣ם <WH251> And with them their brethren הַמִּשְׁנִ֑ים <WH4932> of the second זְכַרְיָ֡הוּ <WH2148> [degree] Zechariah בֵּ֡ן <WH1122> Ben וְיַֽעֲזִיאֵ֡ל <WH3268> and Jaaziel וּשְׁמִֽירָמ֡וֹת <WH8070> and Shemiramoth וִיחִיאֵ֣ל ׀ <WH3171> and Jehiel וְעֻנִּ֡י <WH6042> and Unni אֱלִיאָ֡ב <WH446> Eliab וּבְנָיָ֡הוּ <WH1141> and Benaiah וּמַֽעֲשֵׂיָ֡הוּ <WH4641> and Maaseiah וּמַתִּתְיָהוּ֩ <WH4993> and Mattithiah וֶאֱלִ֨יפְלֵ֜הוּ <WH466> and Elipheleh וּמִקְנֵיָ֨הוּ <WH4737> and Mikneiah וְעֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֛ם <WH5654> and Obededom וִֽיעִיאֵ֖ל <WH3273> and Jeiel הַשֹּׁעֲרִֽים׃ <WH7778> the porters

וְהַמְשֹׁ֣רְרִ֔ים <WH7891> So the singers הֵימָ֥ן <WH1968> Heman אָסָ֖ף <WH623> Asaph וְאֵיתָ֑ן <WH387> and Ethan בִּמְצִלְתַּ֥יִם <WH4700> with cymbals נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass לְהַשְׁמִֽיעַ׃ <WH8085> [were appointed] to sound

וּזְכַרְיָ֨ה <WH2148> And Zechariah וַעֲזִיאֵ֜ל <WH5815> and Aziel וּשְׁמִֽירָמ֤וֹת <WH8070> and Shemiramoth וִֽיחִיאֵל֙ <WH3171> and Jehiel וְעֻנִּ֣י <WH6042> and Unni וֶֽאֱלִיאָ֔ב <WH446> and Eliab וּמַעֲשֵׂיָ֖הוּ <WH4641> and Maaseiah וּבְנָיָ֑הוּ <WH1141> and Benaiah בִּנְבָלִ֖ים <WH5035> with psalteries עַל־ <WH5921> to עֲלָמֽוֹת׃ <WH5961> on Alamoth

וּמַתִּתְיָ֣הוּ <WH4993> And Mattithiah וֶאֱלִֽיפְלֵ֗הוּ <WH466> and Elipheleh וּמִקְנֵיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH4737> and Mikneiah וְעֹבֵ֣ד אֱדֹ֔ם <WH5654> and Obededom וִֽיעִיאֵ֖ל <WH3273> and Jeiel וַעֲזַזְיָ֑הוּ <WH5812> and Azaziah בְּכִנֹּר֥וֹת <WH3658> with harps עַל־ <WH5921> on הַשְּׁמִינִ֖ית <WH8067> on the Sheminith לְנַצֵּֽחַ׃ <WH5329> to excel

וּכְנַנְיָ֥הוּ <WH3663> And Chenaniah שַֽׂר־ <WH8269> chief הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> of the Levites בְּמַשָּׂ֑א <WH4853> [was] for song יָסֹר֙ <WH3256> he instructed בַּמַּשָּׂ֔א <WH4853> about the song כִּ֥י <WH3588> because מֵבִ֖ין <WH995> because he [was] skilful הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he
וּבֶֽרֶכְיָה֙ <WH1296> And Berechiah וְאֶלְקָנָ֔ה <WH511> and Elkanah שֹׁעֲרִ֖ים <WH7778> [were] doorkeepers לָאָרֽוֹן׃ <WH727> for the ark

וּשְׁבַנְיָ֡הוּ <WH7645> And Shebaniah וְיֽוֹשָׁפָ֡ט <WH3146> and Jehoshaphat וּנְתַנְאֵ֡ל <WH5417> and Nethaneel וַעֲמָשַׂ֡י <WH6022> and Amasai וּ֠זְכַרְיָהוּ <WH2148> and Zechariah וּבְנָיָ֤הוּ <WH1141> and Benaiah וֶֽאֱלִיעֶ֙זֶר֙ <WH461> and Eliezer הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> the priests [מַחֲצֹצְרִים כ] (מַחְצְרִים֙ <WH2690> blow ק) בַּחֲצֹ֣צְר֔וֹת <WH2689> with the trumpets לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וְעֹבֵ֤ד אֱדֹם֙ <WH5654> and Obededom וִֽיחִיָּ֔ה <WH3174> and Jehiah שֹׁעֲרִ֖ים <WH7778> [were] doorkeepers לָאָרֽוֹן׃ <WH727> for the ark

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become דָוִ֛יד <WH1732> So David וְזִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and the captains הָאֲלָפִ֑ים <WH505> over thousands הַהֹֽלְכִ֗ים <WH1980> went לְֽהַעֲל֞וֹת <WH5927> to bring up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֧וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> from בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> out of the house עֹבֵֽד־ אֱדֹ֖ם <WH5654> of Obededom בְּשִׂמְחָֽה׃ <WH8057> with joy ס

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become בֶּעְזֹ֣ר <WH5826> helped הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> And it came to pass when God אֶ֨ת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> the Levites נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <WH5375> that bare אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּזְבְּח֥וּ <WH2076> that they offered שִׁבְעָֽה־ <WH7651> seven פָרִ֖ים <WH6499> bullocks וְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> and seven אֵילִֽים׃ <WH352> rams

וְדָוִ֞יד <WH1732> And David מְכֻרְבָּ֣ל ׀ <WH3736> [was] clothed בִּמְעִ֣יל <WH4598> with a robe בּ֗וּץ <WH948> of fine linen וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַלְוִיִּם֙ <WH3881> and all the Levites הַנֹּשְׂאִ֣ים <WH5375> that bare אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָר֔וֹן <WH727> the ark וְהַמְשֹׁ֣רְרִ֔ים <WH7891> and the singers וּכְנַנְיָ֛ה <WH3663> and Chenaniah הַשַּׂ֥ר <WH8269> the master הַמַּשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> of the song הַמְשֹֽׁרְרִ֑ים <WH7891> with the singers וְעַל־ <WH5921> wore דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> David אֵפ֥וֹד <WH646> also [had] upon him an ephod בָּֽד׃ <WH906> of linen

וְכָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Thus all Israel מַעֲלִים֙ <WH5927> brought up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בִּתְרוּעָה֙ <WH8643> with shouting וּבְק֣וֹל <WH6963> and with sound שׁוֹפָ֔ר <WH7782> of the cornet וּבַחֲצֹצְר֖וֹת <WH2689> and with trumpets וּבִמְצִלְתָּ֑יִם <WH4700> and with cymbals מַשְׁמִעִ֕ים <WH8085> making a noise בִּנְבָלִ֖ים <WH5035> with psalteries וְכִנֹּרֽוֹת׃ <WH3658> and harps

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> happened אֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> And it came to pass [as] the ark בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בָּ֖א <WH935> came עַד־ <WH5704> against עִ֣יר <WH5892> to the city דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> of David וּמִיכַ֨ל <WH4324> that Michal בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> of Saul נִשְׁקְפָ֣ה ׀ <WH8259> looking out בְּעַ֣ד <WH1157> out הַחַלּ֗וֹן <WH2474> at a window וַתֵּ֨רֶא <WH7200> saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> king דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> David מְרַקֵּ֣ד <WH7540> dancing וּמְשַׂחֵ֔ק <WH7832> and playing וַתִּ֥בֶז <WH959> and she despised ל֖וֹ בְּלִבָּֽהּ׃ <WH3820> him in her heart פ
